title: Don't Make Mountains Out of Molehills
itunes:title: Don't Make Mountains Out of Molehills
description:
Most of the time it's the little foxes—the minor inconveniences in life—that spoil the vine. Friends, don’t make a big deal about things that aren’t a big deal. Let this message encourage you to stay in peace and learn to handle the little things in life.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
